ygData.subject: Re: Wizards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Thats a crock.  It gets resisted all the time.  One of an Enchanters biggest drawbacks is their resistability.  Imagine, every single spell is magic based,
ygData.messageBody:
> Also talking to the enchanter
> Mesmerize and MemBlur has never been resisted, He even used it on a Hill
> Giant when he was 20th just to check.

Thats a crock. It gets resisted all the time. One of an Enchanters biggest
drawbacks is their resistability. Imagine, every single spell is magic based, and
is therefore about as reliable as root. Of course, they get tashen(i) to make up
for this, but that spell benifits all in a group, not just the Enchanters. On a
side note, Tashen(i) does not have a savings throw, and will not be resisted by
either Resistance or level limitations. Perhaps this was the spell he used on th
HG. Other enchanters spells are capped the same as a wizards.
